DOC.brief_title: Improving Antimicrobial Prescribing Practices Neonatal ICU
DOC.detailed_description: Antimicrobial stewardship improve safety quality healthcare , reduce antimicrobial resistance , reduce healthcare cost . However , optimal strategy NICU population unknown study evaluate impact stewardship population . To determine 3 randomly assign bundle stewardship intervention would reduce overall inappropriate antimicrobial use NICU . The investigator hypothesize bundle use three interdisciplinary antimicrobial stewardship strategy ( education , computer decision support prescriber audit feedback ) would effectively reduce overall inappropriate antimicrobial use compare usual care . A pre-post intervention study ( one baseline year without intervention - May 1 , 2009 - April 30 , 2010 , follow two year intervention - May 1 , 2010 - April 30 , 2012 ) perform 4 academically affiliate , level III NICUs . The site randomly assign usual care , one intervention , two intervention , three intervention .
